scripts.deck: marp --no-stdin slides/* && mkdir -p public && find ./slides -name '*.html' -exec mv {} public/ \; && ncp assets public/assets
scripts.vercel-build: yum install nss mesa-libgbm -y && MARP_USER=root CHROME_PATH=$(npx -y @puppeteer/browsers@latest install chrome@stable --path $(realpath ./tmp) | awk '{print $2}') npm run build
